theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and FOXO-Mediated Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on IIS pathway and DAF-16/FOXO transcription factor regulation of lifespan and longevity genes.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes IIS pathway and dFOXO transcription factor role in lifespan extension in Drosophila.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Details IIS regulation of DAF-16/FOXO localization and function affecting aging.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Covers genetic modulation of IGF-I signaling and FOXO involvement in lifespan extension.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Links IIS and DAF-16/FOXO to longevity and tumor resistance mechanisms.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on IIS and DAF-16/FOXO regulation of stem cell aging and maintenance.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes IIS pathway regulation of longevity via DAF-2 receptor and DAF-16 transcription factor.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains lifespan extension and healthspan effects from reduced IIS signaling.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Details DAF-16/FOXO regulation and evolutionary conservation of IIS in aging.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on IIS effects on neuronal aging and FOXO-mediated synaptic maintenance.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes insulin-like receptor signaling and dauer formation linked to aging regulation.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses SHIP2 as a modulator of IIS and its impact on aging and metabolism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and FOXO-Mediated Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Covers conserved molecular mechanisms of insulin/IGF-I signaling in aging across species.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and FOXO-Mediated Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links DAF-2/DAF-16 pathway to aging and innate immunity regulation.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Links caloric restriction effects to modulation of FOXO gene expression in skeletal muscle.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes caloric restriction extending lifespan and delaying age-related diseases.
